channel.title: Georgetown University WordPress Announcements
channel.description: List of announcements for GU-managed WordPress sites.

item.title: January WordPress Office Hours
item.description: Web Services will be hosting our monthly WordPress-specific office hours on Tuesday January 8, 3-5 p.m. in Car Barn 101. Drop in anytime to chat about migration, accessibility, layouts, or anything else you'd like to discuss regarding your Georgetown WordPress website. See you there!
